content: the snowbird snuggle scarf is a modern winter essential with clean lines cozy texture and just enough detail to feel elevated knit seamlessly in the round this scarf has no wrong side so it drapes beautifully no matter how you style it finished with i-cord fringe it strikes the perfect balance between polished and relaxed designed with both new and seasoned knitters in mind this is an easy intuitive project that still feels intentional and chic beginners will love the simple construction and forgiving gauge while experienced knitters will appreciate a quick satisfying knit that results in a timeless accessory you ll reach for again and again the pattern is fully customizable adjust the length and the width knit to your gauge and it s designed to help you use up every last gram of yarn ideal for special skeins stash yarn or a cozy weekend project ✨ this pattern is available for free finished size approx 10 x 82 in / 26 x 208 cm after blocking excluding fringe easily adjustable to suit your style yarn approx 600 m / 656 yd of sport to bulky weight yarn depending on gauge choose a yarn that creates a fabric you love the sample shown was knit using sewrella yarn woolly base 164 yd / 50 g a 90% superwash merino wool / 10% recycled nylon blend with a soft fluffy texture although categorized as a sport-weight yarn it knits up at a bulky-weight gauge any yarn that produces a fabric you enjoy at gauge will work well using a thicker worsted or bulky yarn will result in a denser heavier fabric needles us 10 5 6 5 mm 16 in / 40 cm circular needle spare needle for stitch rearranging optional cordsmith or dpns for i-cord fringe gauge 12 sts x 14 rounds = 4 in / 10 cm in stockinette stitch worked in the round after blocking whether you re knitting your very first scarf or adding a handmade staple to your winter wardrobe the snowbird snuggle scarf is the kind of project that feels as good to knit as it does to wear
